raw_body: WIJESINGHE – MALLIKA – Daughter of late Mr & Mrs A.G. Hinniappuhamy,​ beloved wife of Gamini Wijesinghe,​ beloved mother of Prabha,​ Araliya,​ Devaka,​ Vishni,​ Dr. Yasas,​ Roshini & Mangala,​ beloved grandmother of Rahul,​ Hansika,​ Isuri & Bawantha,​ beloved great-grandmother of Ohana,​ beloved sister of Rathnapala,​ Yasmin Leena (Australia) & Kamala. Leaving residence – 152A,​ Duwa Road,​ Beddagana,​ Pitakotte at 4.15 p.m. for cremation at 5.00 p.m. General Cemetery,​ Borella on 19th August 2023.052387
